question: man don’t have get permission from his first wife to have second wife. I have been asked by few people what is the proof
answer:
QUESTION

I know in hanafi fiqh man don’t have get permission from his first wife to have second wife. I have been asked by few people what is the proof of this from Qura’an and Hadith.

ANSWER


Share:

The Qur’aan permits one to take more than one wife and the only condition attached is equality between/among his wives. If the consent of the first wife was necessary, it should be there or at least in the Hadith or practise of Rasulullah [sallallaahu alayhi wasallam].

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
